label: AnimalCertificate
comment: A collection of data for a piece of written, printed or electronic matter that provides information or evidence about the identity of an animal or a batch of animals.

datatypeProperties.comment: An animal certification applicable to this animal certificate.
A statement that user needs of the present are met without compromising the needs of future generations.
A code specifying a type of specified certificate.

referencedBy.comment: An animal certificate specified for this TT animal.
